==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|だん|せい|yomi=on}}

===Pronunciation===

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|だんせい}}

# [[man]], [[boy]], [[male]] person
# {{lb|ja|grammar}} [[masculine]] [[gender]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|男の人|おとこ の ひと}}: man

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|女の人|おんな の ひと}}: woman
* {{ja-r|女性|じょせい}}: female

====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|男性軍|だんせいぐん}}: the [[guys]] team, as in a guys-vs.-girls competition
* {{ja-r|男性的|だんせいてき}}: [[man-like]], [[manly]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|男性美|だんせいび}}: masculine [[beauty]]
* {{ja-r|男性用|だんせいよう}}: "for men", as on a restroom door or clothing label
{{der-bottom}}
